textBody: Veuillez trouver ci-dessous les coordonnées afin de joindre l’interlocuteur souhaité :
reportError: Report an error to the administrators
name: Name
subtitle: Subtitle
uploadPhotoDragAndDrop: Or drag and drop photos here
handicapAccessibility: Acces for people with reduced mobility
targetAgeFromError: The age must be lower than the maximum age
targetAgeToError: The age must be higher than the minimum age
beforeUnload: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave this page?
